page.title: 19A MUSLIM WEEKEND-PART II
page.content: agnigation is learning to spell the nums 1 to 100 in words.School finishes a 2.00.I go back home then for my meal of rice and vegetable curry.I rest till 3.30.I play outdoors or perhaps go fish ing until 5.00.I have a wash when I get home then have tea.After tea it is time for religious washing(ozoo in Bengali), ready for prayers using my carpet(Namaz After prayers I watch television till 7 .00 when I wash and pray again.This is followed by 1/2 hour free time,then I wash and pray again.After another 1/2 hour free time we have our evening meal After this I wash and pray once more,& then it is time for bed.Sunday is the same except there is no Bengali school. I read or write instead.************** A Mosque has been built in Northampton in the vicinity of Regent Square to accommodate the growing Muslim community.
